data.title: Local Singings
data.meta_description: If you're interested in learning more about Shape Note music (and the best way to learn is to start singing yourself!) there are numerous singing groups that meet in Pennsylvania. Some groups meet weekly or monthly, and there are also a number of larger singings during the year; new singers are always welcome, no auditions…
data.text:
If you’re interested in learning more about Shape Note music (and the best way to learn is to start singing yourself!) there are numerous singing groups that meet in Pennsylvania. Some groups meet weekly or monthly, and there are also a number of larger singings during the year; new singers are always welcome, no auditions and no singing experience necessary.

If you would like us to provide information about a singing, drop us a line at pasacredharp[at]gmail.com. Contact information for groups is provided when available.

BERKS COUNTY SINGING (near Reading)

This singing meets the third and fourth Sundays of each month from 5:30-8 PM at Exeter Friends Meeting at:

191 Meetinghouse Road

Douglassville, PA 19518

For more information contact Ted Stokes at 610-689-4083 or EdwardBStokes [at] gmail.com.

___________

BRANDYWINE VALLEY SACRED HARP SINGING (south of West Chester)

Due to serious health concerns of several of our members, we are requiring all attending this singing to test sometime on the Mondays that we meet. Please do not attend if you feel ill or have been in contact with someone who has Covid.

This singing meets bimonthly on Monday nights (please call before attending if the weather is bad) from 7-9pm at:

2024

January 22 (cancelled)

February 5 (cancelled due to several of us being sick-let’s not spread germs-no Covid)

February 19

March 4, 18

April 1, 15 (April 15th, cancelled)

May 6

June 3, 17

July 8, 22 (July 8 cancelled)

August 5, 19

Birmingham Friends Meeting,

1245 Birmingham Rd

West Chester, PA 19382.

Contact: Laura Densmore 610 405-2485 or PASacredHarp[at]gmail.com.

___________

ERIE AREA SINGING: This singing is suspended.

This singing usually meets the fourth Sunday of each month at a local singer’s home

from 2-5 PM. In November, the meeting date is the third Sunday to avoid Thanksgiving,

and in December the date is the second Sunday to avoid the Christmas holidays.

Call to confirm the dates.

Contact: Katie Eichenlaub White at 449-5311 or RevKatie52 [at] gmail.com

_________

HAVERTOWN SINGING (near Philadelphia) This singing is suspended.

This singing meets second Fridays of each month from 7:30-9:30 PM at St. James United

Church of Christ, 135 Myrtle Ave, Havertown, PA 19083.

Contact: Marian McKenzie at 610 896-1565 or mmckenzi [at] haverford.edu

_________

LANCASTER AREA SACRED HARP SINGING

This singing meets first Sundays from 3:00 PM-5:30 PM.

1855 Stony Battery Road, Mountville, PA.

Contact: Elizabeth Patton at 717 397-4762 or epatton256 [at] verizon.net or Ruth Wampler 717 471-6055 or beautifulfriend05@gmail.com

__________________

LEHIGH VALLEY SINGING

This singing meets the 4th Monday of each month at Godfrey Daniels Listening Room in Bethlehem, PA.

Contact: Kyle Johnston at Kylejohnston89 [at] gmail.com

_________

PHILADELPHIA

For singings in the city of Philadelphia, please see Philadelphia Sacred Harp and Shape-Note Singing website.

__________

PITTSBURGH SACRED HARP SINGERS

This singing meets the first Saturday of every month from 1:00-3:30 PM at Church of the Redeemer, 5700 Forbes Ave, Pittsburgh, PA 15217

http://pendletonanderson.com/shape_note_singing/

Contact: Penny Anderson pgh_sacred_harp@fastmail.net or 412-371-5898 or 412 310-9167

_________

SOMERSET COUNTY SINGING

This singing meets second Thursdays of each month at Mount Union Church

at the corner of Turkey Foot Trail Road and Mount Union Road, near Rockwood

in Somerset County, PA. In January, February and March they meet at

Kingwood Church of God, Rte 281, south of Somersett (because it’s heated!)

For more information, contact Linda Marker at 814-352-8029, or:

mt_union_sacred_harp_singers [at] yahoo.com

Website: Mount Union Church

_________

STATE COLLEGE SINGING

This singing meets the second and fourth Mondays of the month.

Beginners’ introduction at 6:45 pm

Main singing: 7:00-8:30 pm

at University Mennonite Church, 1606 Norma St., State College, PA.

Visit the State College Sacred Harp web page

For more information, please contact Hal Kunkel at 814-360-2162 or at hal.kunkel@gmail.com

_________
